IntroQuests.questDescription: Talk to WTAF for Sam's first quest!
We need to rebuild the engine, WTAF suggests the player to mine for some silver, copper and gold

IntroQuests.questName: I Hope This Doesn't Get Stuck on My Face...
IntroQuests.questDescription: We need to rebuild the engine, and we need alien goo for that... But since we dont have alien goo in game just collect some stone.
The engine is done! Smash that LAUNCH button, and we're outta here! But we dont have the engine to smash thos. So gotta wait.
